articles.description: Hopkins has been permanently banned from the social media platform
articles.content:
Katie Hopkins was banned from Twitter for a message she sent to Welsh rugby player Ashton Hewitt, it has emerged.
The controversial, right wing commentator was booted off the social media platform l… [+1602 chars]
